com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui
Class TimerGraphic

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui.TimerGraphic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class TimerGraphic
extends javax.swing.JComponent

The TimerGraphic class displays the information of a Timer in a graphical display.



Operations:
  • The TimerGraphic class can graphically display a Timer.

Version:
0.3, 12/04/08
Author:
Ryan S. Lange
See Also:
Timer, Point, Serialized Form
Version History:
- 01/21/09 0.3 Added source code - 12/04/08 0.2 Added Version History & Pseudocode
- 12/01/08 0.1 Initial Class Skeleton
